name: @phagento/angular-img-lazy-load
description: An angular ng-src drop-in replacement that makes images magically lazy load.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs angular-img-lazy-load.js --compress --source-map dist/angular-img-lazy-load.min.js.map --source-map-root .. --source-map-url ../dist/angular-img-lazy-load.js.map -o dist/angular-img-lazy-load.min.js

author: Simian <dev@simian.co>
